text: Hey guys - I just wanted to drop a quick line regarding David: He’s out of surgery, and it sounds like it went very well. They did not find any blockages. So that’s good news. They still need to run more tests to figure out what *did* happen, but so far so good.
The Great Seltzer Drought of July is finally over. Stay hydrated!
Hey everyone - one more Ewald update: He’s being discharged from the hospital any moment now and will get to head on home.
Obviously this is great news. I don’t have much more info on details, but the upshot is that things are going the right direction.
any word on what the cause was?
Just had dr come in in fact. He's at a loss for root. Stress? Blood pressure? Some random heart event?
I’ll just say what we’re all thinking: aliens
Prognosis is to rest up, not lift heavy shit, buy a heart monitor, etc
But he and team have been trying to figure it out: heart attack in what seems to be otherwise mostly healthy person
guess you'll have to use the 12 lb ball at rollers
Anyway, I've not said it, but thank you all for good thoughts. All this obviously got my attention
